title: misc/vim Import and Godoc autocompletion do not work for packages in $GOPATH
body:
by **tobias.columbus**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Install any package in $GOPATH
2. Neither ":Import" nor ":Godoc" autocompletion will find the
package in $GOPATH

What is the expected output?
Working autocompletion for :Import and :Godoc 

What do you see instead?
The packages are not found.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
doesn't matter

Which operating system are you using?
doesn't matter

Which version are you using?
go1.0.2

Please provide any additional information below.
I adapted go#complete#Package in misc/vim/autoload/go/complete.vim to find packages in
$GOPATH, too. Patch attached.
Attachments: 1. complete.vim.patch (1411 bytes)
